value.title: Use Azure SQL Managed Instance Link to have a Read Replica in the cloud!
value.excerpt: Want to leverage the power of the cloud with your on-prem SQL Server? Azure SQL Managed Instance may be the answer for you! Dani joins us to talk about why MI Link can help bridge the two.  Azure SQL Managed Instance https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/azure-sql/managed-instance/sql-managed-instance-paas-overview?view=azuresql

value.title: Using Images from a Database in Power BI
value.excerpt: We've looked at images from sources like OneDrive and the web with your Power BI reports. What about from a database? Is that possible? Patrick takes a look at how you can do it. value.title: Visualize Graph Data in Power BI

value.title: What are Power BI data connectors and why should you care?

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach.
